intro: Guettardella obscura, commonly known as the dark guettardella, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its small, pale green leaves and inconspicuous, yellowish flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and understudied species.
